pages.title: Degraded service
pages.summary:
Monitoring -
We have rolled out a patch that should have solved the suspected issue. The systems are now under close monitoring. Jobs have been restarted and will be processed in the next few hours. (16:25 UTC — Aug 19) Investigating
We have isolated the core issue and are preparing a patch to be rolled out soon. (16:25 UTC — Aug 19) Investigating
We are experiencing a service level problem on app.
